ygData.messageBody:
The combinations are done in a Vale sewing kit. Smithed in the Vale
Forge. To the best of my knowledge, only Halflings can make these
things. Now whether or not a non-halfling can use the kit I do not
know.

The embroidery needle is reusable.

Barto
